author: coinratinternal@gmail.com
content: Delysium (AGI) ico presaleDelysium aims to construct a blockchain-based virtual world where a staggering one billion individuals and 100 billion AI Virtual Beings coexist in harmony. These virtual inhabitants can serve as both companions and non-playable characters in a variety of settings, and players have the ability to design and cultivate their own AI entities. These interactions can involve education on cryptocurrency and asset trading, and the decentralized game publishing infrastructure will link personalized games to on-chain assets, further enhancing society's prosperity. Delysium's website already offers AI Virtual Beings, and it has become the first AAA-quality game to be featured on the Epic Games Store.ico presale details can be found here : https://icogems.com/ico/Delysium
